alert.note: Alert for Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:52PM CDT until June 07 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Worth County in northwestern Missouri... Northeastern Nodaway County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1051 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hopkins, or near Bedford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grant City, Sheridan and Worth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
